title: Nothing Is Set In Stone
description:
Linda and Emily start off with a New Years weekend recap including the Winter Classic that then turns into where else they would like to see a Winter Classic take place. After that they get into the Flyers, the Oilers, the Blackhawks, the Avalanche, and how nothing is solidified when it comes to the playoffs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
